Sinopse: When a best-selling author decides to escape the media frenzy, her plan goes awry when she's caught in a thunderstorm and crashes her car. The town doctor--a single dad--finds her wandering around with no memory and no ID and invites her to stay in his guest house until her memory returns. As she blends seamlessly into their family life, she must decide if the life she's been living is the life she wants.—Happy_Evil_Dude
